Functions
request
sub request

This method is called for sending request to oxd for all the oxd commands.

Parameters

object RequestObject

Returns

void

getResponseData
sub getResponseData

If data is not empty it is returning response data from oxd in array format.  If data empty or error , you have problem with parameter or protocol.

Parameters

object ResponseObject

Returns

object ResponseData

getData
sub getData

Data which need to send to oxd server.

Parameters
string $command

oxd-server command name

dict $params

oxd-server request parameters

Returns

object RequestObject

getResponseObject
sub getResponseObject

It returns response object from oxd-server in json format.

Returns

object ResponseObject
